title: Job Openings at KyDAL Office Point
content:
KyDAL Office Point (KOP) is a world class organization which offers wide range solutions for effective and high performance of co-operate setups. We offer tangible supplies for smooth and effective office operations as well as strategic support for high performance and maximum output of personnel by delivering best practice HRM systems and training solutions. Our customized solutions are focused on helping Organizations optimize the potentials of their people - Primary Asset, while providing work tools that maximize output and productivity.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Marketing Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Job Type: Hybrid (Remote and On-site)
Slots: 100 Openings

Responsibilities


	The role is to market the E-commerce platform and get vendors to register on the platform.


Expectations


	Each marketer is required to enlist 100 vendors or affiliates on the platform monthly at the rate of 2k per vendor.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess any of the following educational qualifications: SSCE / OND / NCE / HND / BSc.


Requirement:


	Candidate must be proficient in smartphone usage with the ability to onboard new prospects.


Remuneration


	Salary: N75,000 per month.
	Note: This role offers a salary of NGN 75,000, tied directly to key performance indicators (KPIs).
	Monthly KPI Target: To onboard a minimum of 100 sign-ups (vendors or affiliates) on the ?2,000 plan each month.
	For every month, each marketer having met the target is entitled to 75k.


Application Closing Date: 26th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Cover Letter and CV to: Info@kydalofficepoint.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Facility Manager

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Delegating cleaning and maintenance tasks to team members
	Monitoring the safety and cleanliness of interior and exterior areas, such as offices, conference rooms, parking lots and outdoor recreation spaces
	Performing routine maintenance on facilities and making repairs as needed
	Scheduling routine inspections and emergency repairs with outside vendors
	Ensuring proper security measures for the workplace, including collaborating with security system vendors or a team of security professionals
	Maintaining day-to-day operations of facilities, such as delegating or completing maintenance orders
	Creating reports on maintenance, repairs, safety and other occurrences for supervisors and other relevant staff
	Preparing facilities for changing weather conditions
	Collaborating with building owners and upper management on budgeting for facilities needs.


Salary
N300,000 - N500,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 20th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Info@kydalofficepoint.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Virtual Marketer

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	To onboard a minimum of 100 sign-ups (vendors or affiliates) on the N2,000 plan each month
	To onboard business owners on the e-commerce platform in Oyo State.
	To promote awareness of the e-commerce platform in Oyo State


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an FSLC, HND, Master's Degree, NCE, OND, SSCE / GCE / NECO / B.Sc Degree with 0-4 yearscof work experience.


Salary
N70,000 - N75,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 4th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@kydalofficepoint.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Business Adviser Job at Japan Tobacco International (JTI)




        
    

        
        Japan Tobacco International (JTI) is a member of the Japan Tobacco Group of Companies. Our 45,000 people come from all over the world, representing more than 100 nationalities. We market world-renowned brands in more than 130 countries with 409 offices, 29 factories, and 8 research & development centers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Adviser

Job ID: 101307
Job Location: Lagos

Position Description
     

            
    




	The incumbent, working very closely with the Area Sales Manager will be responsible for all aspects of coordination and collaboration with the distributor on the sales and distribution operation and on the trade marketing field force deployment and monitoring.
	His/Her role is to ensure that distribution and merchandising strategy as well as the KPIs agreed upon with the distributor are being met.
	He/She will work closely with the distributor & Agency staff in the management and execution of trade and consumer activation programs as well as monitor implementation and competitive activity.


Main Areas of Responsibilities
Volume & Market Share delivery


	Ensure volume & market share growth & deliver on location volume targets while reporting any changes/challenges to the Area Sales Maanger.


Distributor Management:


	Working in liaison with the distributor staff; effectively manage the sales and marketing activities in the location in order to ensure the attainment of set objectives for our brands as set by management. Eg 1. New brand launches, 2. Route to Market (RTM) plans & strategies, 3. Monitoring price etc.


Responsible for effective Implementation of Sales & Distribution:


	Merchandising, through effective territory planning & field force deployment ( Indirect Sales Force/Sales Support). Monitors progress and recommends corrective action where necessary.


Reporting:


	Gather and disseminate accurate and timely market and intelligence information on JTI and competitors activities in order to contribute to timeliness and quality of decisions being made by management by providing daily, weekly, monthly updates with regards to all sales & marketing activities, photographs of trade activities, carry out audits on our stock availability etc.


External Environment:


	This is ever changing due to inherent volatility of the political ,socio-economic & legal framework; hence the need to ensure a full & clear understanding of the external environment in our market (particularly Legal & M&S programmes implementation) & work appropriately with the internal team & distributor to ensure we are complying fully with industry standards & government regulations


Job Requirements


	A University degree or equivalent
	3-5 years experience in sales & distribution / channel management / Implementation of consumer and Trade Marketing Plans.


Functional Skills:


	Distributor and field force planning and management
	Trade marketing and POC consumer activation
	Shelf space management
	Category management
	Field intelligence, data gathering, KPI monitoring / reporting
	Negotiation skills
	External environment (taxation, trade pricing, external / corporate relations, legal)
	Deep knowledge of Customer services.

We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos

Social Media Manager Job at OnePyramid Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        OnePyramid Consulting Limited - Our client is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Summary


	We are looking for a talented and passionate Social Media Manager to lead our digital strategy across social platforms.
	You will be responsible for boosting brand awareness, engaging our community around our products, and actively contributing to customer acquisition and retention through innovative, impactful content tied to the country’s sports and social trends.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Define and implement the social media content strategy across platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, X, Telegram, LinkedIn, etc.).
	Conceptualize, produce, and publish engaging content (copy, visuals, videos, stories, livestreams, etc.).
	Manage the editorial calendar aligned with key sports events and marketing campaigns.
	Collaborate with creative teams, influencers, ambassadors, partners, and digital media.
	Monitor, moderate, and animate the community daily (DMs, comments, etc.).
	Drive organic growth and increase content virality.
	Analyze performance using reporting tools (engagement, reach, traffic, conversions). Maintain ongoing market watch on digital trends, competitors, user behaviors, and innovations in the industry.


Requirement
Candidate Profile:


	Minimum 2 to 5 years of experience in a similar role, ideally in entertainment, sports, or online gaming.
	Excellent knowledge of social media platforms and their algorithms.
	Proficiency in content creation tools (Canva, CapCut, Photoshop, etc.) and analytics platforms (Meta Business Suite, TikTok Analytics, etc.).
	Creative, autonomous, and proactive. We want someone who brings bold ideas to the table.
	Passionate about sports, sports betting, and the digital world.
	Fluent in English (knowledge of a local language or another international language is a plus).

	Join a leading and fast-growing brand expanding across Africa (currently present in 5 countries, and more to come).
